column4: question, how do i install downloaded packages when they are in a TAR format?
tar format is like a zip file
right click it and select to unzip it
yes.. so it doesnt automatically install itself right?
or can it just run once i extract it?
well if it is in tar format is is most likely source code
which means you must compile it from scratch
do you know of a guide to help me with programs ilke this?
what are you trying to install?
first, DBDesigner4. but now, i'm downloading my sql gui tools. its basically in tar.gz format
thus the question
unzip the tar.gz archive
then?
open a terminal and go into the directory of the extracted archive
there's no cnfigure file
but the directory already contains executable
s
try running the executable then...
...from the shell
what's a desktop configuration file?
a desktop config file describes certain gui stuff
like how icons are displayed and other stuff like that
